Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: mdfind
Description: Finds files matching a given query

Arguments.Description: Prints an ASCII NUL character after each result path

Arguments.Name: -live
Arguments.Description: Provide live-updates to the number of files matching the query

Arguments.Name: -count
Arguments.Description: Output the total number of matches, instead of the path to the matching items

Arguments.Name: -onlyin
Arguments.Description: Limit the scope of the search to <dir>

Arguments.Name: -name
Arguments.Description: Search for matching file names to <filename> only

Arguments.Name: s
Arguments.Description: Show contents of smart folder ~/Library/Saved Searches/<folder>.savedSearch

Arguments.Name: -literal
Arguments.Description: Force the provided query string to be taken as a literal query string, without interpretation

Arguments.Name: -interpret
Arguments.Description: Force the provided query string to be interpreted as if it had been typed into the Spotlight menu
